import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useProducts } from '../../context/ProductContext'; const Sidebar = () => { const { categories, updateFilters } = useProducts(); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const handleCategoryFilter = (category) => { updateFilters({ category: category === 'all' ? '' : category }); }; const handlePriceFilter = (priceRange) => { updateFilters({ priceRange }); }; const handleRatingFilter = (rating) => { updateFilters({ rating }); }; return (
